name: Dream and Regenerate
theme: Begin a new cycle by turning inward, restoring energy, and envisioning the future.
guidance: Pause active pursuits. Focus on creativity, study, and emotional renewal. Avoid forcing outcomes.

name: Organize and Prepare
theme: Lay the groundwork for your dreams. Gather allies and resources.
guidance: Structure routines, strengthen relationships, and prepare for expansion next year.

name: Take Action and Grow
theme: Energy surges forward. Express ideas boldly and take tangible steps.
guidance: Pursue new ventures but stay disciplined; avoid impulsive moves.

name: Adapt and Navigate Change
theme: Unpredictability tests stability. Growth continues through adaptability.
guidance: Stay steady, communicate clearly, and welcome mentors who appear.

name: Center and Transform
theme: Major shifts bring both endings and powerful beginnings.
guidance: Stay centered, care for health, and avoid rash relocation or commitments.

name: Consolidate Power and Purpose
theme: Harvest timeâ€”step into leadership and refine your calling.
guidance: Accept recognition but remain humble. Reflect on what truly matters.

name: Celebrate and Appreciate
theme: Enjoy rewards, cultivate grace, and share abundance.
guidance: Travel, celebrate, and enjoy art. Beware of withdrawing into scarcity thinking.

name: Transform Within
theme: Inner transformation and quiet regeneration unfold beneath the surface.
guidance: Slow down, review priorities, meditate, and avoid major new commitments.

name: Complete and Illuminate
theme: Endings and illumination lead to renewal. Prepare for the next cycle.
guidance: Finish projects, release clutter, and step into the public eye with authenticity.
